Online Resources for Digital Ancient Near Eastern Studies

The following provides a list of digital, online resources for studying the ancient Near East.

While this list is meant to be comprehensive, please contact us to let us know if anything is missed!

Digital Projects and Databses

  • Achemenet
  • Achaemenid Royal Inscriptions online (ARIo)
  • Ancient Mesopotamian Gods and Goddesses (AMGG)
  • Archives Babyloniennes (Archibab)
  • Babylonische Medizin (BabMed)
  • The Cuneiform Commentaries Project (Official: CCP; ORACC: CCPo )
  • Database of Neo-Sumerian Texts (BDTNS)
  • The Electronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature (ETCSL) [discontinued]
  • Ebla Digital Archives
  • Emar Online Database
  • Prosobab
  • State Archives of Assyria Online (SAAo)
  • Sources of Early Akkadian Literature (SEAL)
  • Ancient Records of Middle Eastern Polities (ARMEP)
  • Digital Archive of the Annual Review of the Royal Inscriptions of (ARRIM Digital Archive)Mesopotamia
  • Ashurbanipal Library Project (AsbP)
  • The Nineveh Medical Encyclopaedia (NinMed)
  • Reading the Library of Ashurbanipal project (RLAsb)
  • Archival Texts of the Assyrian Empire (ATAE)
  • Neo-Assyrian Archival Texts from Assur (Assur)
  • Neo-Assyrian Archival Texts from Burmarina (Burmarina)

PDFs Repositories

Assyriological Literature

  • ETANA Core Texts: It contains many old publications.
  • Nouvelles Assyriologiques Brèves et Utilitaires (NABU)
  • Aula Orientalis (AuOr)
  • Assyriological Studies (AS)
  • Cuneiform Publications
    • Altbabylonische Briefe (AbB)
    • Assyrian and Babylonian Letters(ABL)
    • The Babylonian Expedition (BE)
    • Babylonian Magic and Sorcery (BMS)
    • Cuneiform Texts from Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum (CT)
    • Keilinschriftliche Bibliothe (KB)
    • PBS (University of Pennsylvania, Publications of the Babylonian Section)
    • VAB (Vorderasiatsche Bibliothek)
  • Orbis Biblicus et Orientalis (OBO)

General Literature

  • HathiTrust: A general repository for old publications and collections.
  • Archive: ALso a general repository for old publications and media.

Dictionaries

  • A Concise Dictionary of Akkadian (CDA)
  • The Chicago Assyrian Dictionary (CAD)

online Dictionaries

  • Encyclopaedia Iranica
  • ePensilvannia Sumerian Dictionary (ePSD)
  • Akkadian Dictionary (eBL: Dictionary)

Contact us

For any questions about OpenDANES, or to join the DANES discord channel or mailing list, send us an email at the Digital Pasts Lab (digpasts@gmail.com)

OpenDANES is a platform for tutorials and white papers about using computational methodologies for ancient Near Eastern studies
